title: Tokyo Ghoul: "Pinto"
synopsis: Shuu Tsukiyama is a "ghoul": a creature who eats human flesh, and he likes to enjoy his meals to the fullest. One night, while relishing in the premeditated murder of his dinner, Shuu's much anticipated first bite is disturbed by a sudden flash of light.
staff: [['Matsubayashi, Tadahito', ['Director']], ['Haraguchi, Noboru', ['Sound Director']], ['Shimada, Souichi', ['Script']], ['Ishida, Sui', ['Original Creator']]]
